alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:12PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Gila and Navajo Counties through 345 PM MST... At 311 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rainbow City, or 25 miles south of Show Low, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized flooding is likely. Locations impacted include... Whiteriver, Turkey Creek, Seven Mile, Rainbow City, Fort Apache, Fort Apache Reservation, East Fork and Canyon Day. This includes State Route 73 between mile markers 328 and 347. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
